text.section:
In addition to any powers set forth elsewhere, the Board may adopt:
any regulation to carry out this title; and
a seal.
In addition to any duties set forth elsewhere, the Board shall keep a record of its proceedings.

section.section: With the advice of the established landscape architect associations, the Board shall adopt, by regulation, a code of ethics for practicing landscape architecture.

The Board shall distribute a copy of the code of ethics:
to each applicant for a license; and
on each renewal of a license, to each licensee.

In addition to complying with the publication requirements of Title 10, Subtitle 1 of the State Government Article, the Board shall distribute a copy of any amendment to the code of ethics to each licensee.
